short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be productive without a to-do list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After installing the extension, the option page will show up every time you open a new browser. Select the mode you want to be in before surfing

Features:
- Check in your mind mode before starting
- Choose which tabs to open upfront for each session
- Block places that create distractions

How to use:
- After installing the extension, its option page will be opened everytime you open the browser
- Choose the mode you want to be in
- Tune the config if needed
- Click on Ok and you are ready to use the Internet!
